title: conferred on me by sections 5 and 31 (amended by section 34 of the Health Act
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Infectious Diseases (EU Digital
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Infectious Diseases (EU Digital 

Covid Certificates) (Revocation) Regulations 2023.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited infectious disease (eu digital covid certificates) (revocation) regulation 2023

title: conferred on me by sections 5 and 31 (amended by section 34 of the Health Act
heading: 2. The following are revoked:
text_raw:
2. The following are revoked: 

(a) 

(b) 

the Infectious Diseases (EU Digital Covid Certificates) 
Regulations 2022 (S.I. No. 139 of 2022); 

the Infectious Diseases (EU Digital Covid Certificates) 
(Amendment) Regulations 2022 (S.I. No. 181 of 2022). 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

17 August, 2023. 

STEPHEN DONNELLY, 
Minister for Health. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 25th August, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [416] 3

title: conferred on me by sections 5 and 31 (amended by section 34 of the Health Act
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations made under sections 5 and 31 (amended by section 34 of the 
Health Act 1953 (No. 26 of 1953)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947) serve 
to revoke S.I. No. 139 of 2022 and S.I. No. 181 of 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 4 [416]
